definition: content/calm/still/quiet/safe/secure/in good health/to find a place for/to install/to fix/to fit/to bring (a charge against sb)/to pacify/to harbor (good intentions)/security/safety/peace/ampere
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable

sentences.english: Deliverers will go up on Mount Zion to govern the mountains of Esau. And the kingdom will be the Lord's.
sentences.chinese: 必有拯救者上锡安山来统治以扫山，王位就归永恒主。

sentences.english: IV. We must make a wise choice between Mt. Sinai and Mt. Zion.
sentences.chinese: 信徒要从西乃山与锡安山之间作智慧的选择。

sentences.english: But upon mount Zion shall be deliverance, and there shall be holiness;
sentences.chinese: 在锡安山必有逃脱的人，那山也必成圣。

sentences.english: But chose the tribe of Judah, the mount Zion which he loved.
sentences.chinese: 却拣选犹大支派，他所喜爱的锡安山。

sentences.english: 68 but he chose the tribe of Judah, Mount Zion, which he loved.
sentences.chinese: 却拣选犹大支派，他所喜爱的锡安山。

sentences.english: Say it,Zion,Mount Zion which is where Jerusalem is founded.
sentences.chinese: 大声说，锡安山，也就是耶路撒冷所在地。

definition: Mount of Olives (in the Christian passion story)
Jehovah (biblical name for God, Hebrew: YHWH)/compare Yahweh 雅威[Ya3 wei1] and God 上帝[Shang4 di4]
